DOC.brief_summary: A randomised , multi-centre , parallel-group efficacy safety study evaluate two three initial treatment session Restylane Skinboosters Vital Lidocaine face . Approximately 50 female subject shall treat two three initial treatment session include long-term follow-up 18 month initial treatment regimen .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Safety Study Evaluating Treatment Sessions Restylane Skinboosters Vital Lidocaine Face
